contents.content:
[{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "Hi when does the Cafe open?","Avatar": "cherry_os_01","Time": "AM 09:58"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "8, you coming for a drink?","UserName": "JOE","Avatar": "joe_os_01","Time": "AM 10:01"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "Band practice ends at 5. Have a meeting with Simon at 8
No place to go, so I want to see if I can wait for him at your place","Avatar": "cherry_os_01","Time": "AM 10:01"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "OH Sure! Then I'll be in the shop at 5. You can just cone in","UserName": "JOE","Avatar": "joe_os_01","Time": "AM 10:02"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "'Come'' in","Avatar": "cherry_os_01","Time": "AM 10:02"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "Stop nitpicking my spelling mistakes. What, are you Simon now XDDD","UserName": "JOE","Avatar": "joe_os_01","Time": "AM 10:02"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "By the way, did you guys get back together?
Why are you guys contacting each other so often recently?","UserName": "JOE","Avatar": "joe_os_01","Time": "AM 10:02"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "No, we didn't
 Some things happened. It's complicated...","Avatar": "cherry_os_01","Time": "AM 10:05"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "I'd ask another question, are Simon and NEKO really not dating or anything?","Avatar": "cherry_os_01","Time": "AM 10:07"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "I don't think so. He said their age is too far apart. He treats her like a little sister","UserName": "JOE","Avatar": "joe_os_01","Time": "AM 10:07"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "So like Shannon...","Avatar": "cherry_os_01","Time": "AM 10:07"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "Have you talked to him about it? How his sister is doing and stuff","Avatar": "cherry_os_01","Time": "AM 10:07"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "Nope. He never allowed me to even mention his sister. Every time I bring it up, he gives me this look with ''SHUT UP'' written all over it","UserName": "JOE","Avatar": "joe_os_01","Time": "AM 10:07"},{"MessageType": 4,"Image": "05_QQ","IsImageClickable": false,"UserName": "JOE","Avatar": "joe_os_01","Time": "AM 10:07"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "I see. I'm almost leaving. I'll talk about the rest at your place","Avatar": "cherry_os_01","Time": "AM 10:08"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "Got it. I'll be waiting in the shop","UserName": "JOE","Avatar": "joe_os_01","Time": "AM 10:08"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "Just a heads up, don't get wasted by me before your customers show up, 
Alcohol Master~","Avatar": "cherry_os_01","Time": "AM 10:08"},{"MessageType": 3,"Image": "04_XD","IsImageClickable": false,"UserName": "Cherry","Avatar": "cherry_os_01","Time": "AM 10:08"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "I have a lot more restraint now","UserName": "JOE","Avatar": "joe_os_01","Time": "AM 10:08"}]

[{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "やほー今日お店何時から？","Avatar": "cherry_os_01","Time": "AM 09:58"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "8時から～来る？","UserName": "JOE","Avatar": "joe_os_01","Time": "AM 10:01"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "バンドの練習が5時に終わって8時にSimonと約束してる
行く場所ないからお店で待たせてもらえないかと思って","Avatar": "cherry_os_01","Time": "AM 10:01"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "お～なるほどね！いいよ～5時臭いで
直接入ってきてもらって構わないから","UserName": "JOE","Avatar": "joe_os_01","Time": "AM 10:02"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "「5時に、おいで」ね","Avatar": "cherry_os_01","Time": "AM 10:02"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "誤字は見逃してくれよ（笑）Simonじゃあるまいし","UserName": "JOE","Avatar": "joe_os_01","Time": "AM 10:02"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "てか、お前らより戻したのか？最近また連絡とってるだろ","UserName": "JOE","Avatar": "joe_os_01","Time": "AM 10:02"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "違うって
いろいろあんの","Avatar": "cherry_os_01","Time": "AM 10:05"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "てか聞きたいんだけどSimonとNEKOって本当に付き合ってないわけ？","Avatar": "cherry_os_01","Time": "AM 10:07"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "なさそうだけどね
年が離れてるからただの妹にしか見えないとさ","UserName": "JOE","Avatar": "joe_os_01","Time": "AM 10:07"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "Shannonみたいな感じか…","Avatar": "cherry_os_01","Time": "AM 10:07"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "妹のことについてあいつと話したことある？","Avatar": "cherry_os_01","Time": "AM 10:07"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "ないね 妹ちゃんの話になるとすっげー怖い顔すんだよあいつ","UserName": "JOE","Avatar": "joe_os_01","Time": "AM 10:07"},{"MessageType": 4,"Image": "05_QQ","IsImageClickable": false,"UserName": "JOE","Avatar": "joe_os_01","Time": "AM 10:07"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "そっか
じゃ、続きは店で","Avatar": "cherry_os_01","Time": "AM 10:08"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "オッケー待ってる","UserName": "JOE","Avatar": "joe_os_01","Time": "AM 10:08"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "お客さんが来る前にあたしに潰されないようにねー
お酒の神様♡","Avatar": "cherry_os_01","Time": "AM 10:08"},{"MessageType": 3,"Image": "04_XD","IsImageClickable": false,"UserName": "Cherry","Avatar": "cherry_os_01","Time": "AM 101:08"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "前より強くなったって！","UserName": "JOE","Avatar": "joe_os_01","Time": "AM 10:08"}]

[{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "Hi Cafe今天幾點開?","Avatar": "cherry_os_01","Time": "AM 09:58"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "八點 要來喝嗎?","UserName": "JOE","Avatar": "joe_os_01","Time": "AM 10:01"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "我練團五點就結束了 晚上八點跟Simon有約
沒地方去 想先去你那邊等他","Avatar": "cherry_os_01","Time": "AM 10:01"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "喔喔 好阿! 那我五點先到店裡 你就直接近來","UserName": "JOE","Avatar": "joe_os_01","Time": "AM 10:02"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "「進」啦","Avatar": "cherry_os_01","Time": "AM 10:02"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "別抓我錯字 你是Simon嗎 XDDD","UserName": "JOE","Avatar": "joe_os_01","Time": "AM 10:02"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "話說你們兩個是不是複合了阿 怎麼最近突然這麼常聯絡?","UserName": "JOE","Avatar": "joe_os_01","Time": "AM 10:02"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "沒有啦 有點複雜……","Avatar": "cherry_os_01","Time": "AM 10:05"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "我倒想問 Simon跟NEKO真的沒有在交往嗎?","Avatar": "cherry_os_01","Time": "AM 10:07"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "沒有吧 他說年紀差很多 把對方當妹妹","UserName": "JOE","Avatar": "joe_os_01","Time": "AM 10:07"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "像Shannon一樣吧...","Avatar": "cherry_os_01","Time": "AM 10:07"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "你有跟他聊過嗎? 他妹現在的情況","Avatar": "cherry_os_01","Time": "AM 10:07"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "沒欸 他完全不讓我提他妹的事 每次一問就擺臭臉","UserName": "JOE","Avatar": "joe_os_01","Time": "AM 10:07"},{"MessageType": 4,"Image": "05_QQ","IsImageClickable": false,"UserName": "JOE","Avatar": "joe_os_01","Time": "AM 10:07"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "好啦 我要準備出門了 剩下到店裡再聊吧","Avatar": "cherry_os_01","Time": "AM 10:08"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "好喔 店裡等你","UserName": "JOE","Avatar": "joe_os_01","Time": "AM 10:08"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "別客人還沒到就先被我灌倒囉 酒神~","Avatar": "cherry_os_01","Time": "AM 10:08"},{"MessageType": 3,"Image": "04_XD","IsImageClickable": false,"UserName": "Cherry","Avatar": "cherry_os_01","Time": "AM 10:08"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "我現在收斂很多了啦","UserName": "JOE","Avatar": "joe_os_01","Time": "AM 10:08"}]

[{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "하이. 오늘 몇 시 오픈?","Avatar": "cherry_os_01","Time": "AM 09:58"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "8시부터~ 올꺼야??","UserName": "JOE","Avatar": "joe_os_01","Time": "AM 10:01"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "오늘 연습 5시에 끝나거든. 8시에 Simon이랑 한 번도 안가 본 곳에 가보기로 했어. 시간 좀 남아서 너희 가게에서 시간이나 때우려고","Avatar": "cherry_os_01","Time": "AM 10:01"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "그렇게 해~. 그럼 나도 5시에 미리 오픈해야겠군. 문 열어둘 테니 알아서 드러와.","UserName": "JOE","Avatar": "joe_os_01","Time": "AM 10:02"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "「들어와」겠지
 멍청아","Avatar": "cherry_os_01","Time": "AM 10:02"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "오타 날 수도 있지 뭐 이리 예민해. 네가 무슨 Simon이냐? ㅋㅋㅋㅋ","UserName": "JOE","Avatar": "joe_os_01","Time": "AM 10:02"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "그런데 너네 다시 재결합한 거야? 요즘 뭐 이리 자주 만나?","UserName": "JOE","Avatar": "joe_os_01","Time": "AM 10:02"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "그건 아니고. 
조금 복잡해.......","Avatar": "cherry_os_01","Time": "AM 10:05"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "그리고 물어볼 게 있는 데,  Simon이랑 NEKO 말이야. 진짜 아무 사이도 아니야?","Avatar": "cherry_os_01","Time": "AM 10:07"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "아니겠지. 나이 차도 많이 나고 그냥 동생 같은 애라고 말하긴 했었어.","UserName": "JOE","Avatar": "joe_os_01","Time": "AM 10:07"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "Shannon처럼 생각하는 건가...","Avatar": "cherry_os_01","Time": "AM 10:07"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "Simon이랑 동생 얘기는 해봤어? 지금 상태가 어떤지","Avatar": "cherry_os_01","Time": "AM 10:07"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "아니. 아예 말도 못 꺼내게 하더라. 매번 물어보면 표정이 확 어두워지더라고.","UserName": "JOE","Avatar": "joe_os_01","Time": "AM 10:07"},{"MessageType": 4,"Image": "05_QQ","IsImageClickable": false,"UserName": "JOE","Avatar": "joe_os_01","Time": "AM 10:07"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "알았어. 나도 이제 나갈 준비 해야겠다. 가게로 갈 테니깐 그때 다시 얘기하자.","Avatar": "cherry_os_01","Time": "AM 10:08"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "ㅇㅋ. 가게에 있을게.","UserName": "JOE","Avatar": "joe_os_01","Time": "AM 10:08"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "손님들 오기 전에 
나한테 먼저 쓰러지면 안돼용 주신님~","Avatar": "cherry_os_01","Time": "AM 10:08"},{"MessageType": 3,"Image": "04_XD","IsImageClickable": false,"UserName": "Cherry","Avatar": "cherry_os_01","Time": "AM 10:08"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "나 주량 많이 늘었다고!","UserName": "JOE","Avatar": "joe_os_01","Time": "AM 10:08"}]

[{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "Hi Cafe今天幾點開?","Avatar": "cherry_os_01","Time": "AM 09:58"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "八點 要來喝嗎?","UserName": "JOE","Avatar": "joe_os_01","Time": "AM 10:01"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "我練團五點就結束了 晚上八點跟Simon有約
沒地方去 想先去你那邊等他","Avatar": "cherry_os_01","Time": "AM 10:01"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "喔喔 好阿! 那我五點先到店裡 你就直接近來","UserName": "JOE","Avatar": "joe_os_01","Time": "AM 10:02"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "「進」啦","Avatar": "cherry_os_01","Time": "AM 10:02"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "別抓我錯字 你是Simon嗎 XDDD","UserName": "JOE","Avatar": "joe_os_01","Time": "AM 10:02"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "話說你們兩個是不是複合了阿 怎麼最近突然這麼常聯絡?","UserName": "JOE","Avatar": "joe_os_01","Time": "AM 10:02"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "沒有啦 有點複雜……","Avatar": "cherry_os_01","Time": "AM 10:05"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "我倒想問 Simon跟NEKO真的沒有在交往嗎?","Avatar": "cherry_os_01","Time": "AM 10:07"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "沒有吧 他說年紀差很多 把對方當妹妹","UserName": "JOE","Avatar": "joe_os_01","Time": "AM 10:07"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "像Shannon一樣吧...","Avatar": "cherry_os_01","Time": "AM 10:07"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "你有跟他聊過嗎? 他妹現在的情況","Avatar": "cherry_os_01","Time": "AM 10:07"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "沒欸 他完全不讓我提他妹的事 每次一問就擺臭臉","UserName": "JOE","Avatar": "joe_os_01","Time": "AM 10:07"},{"MessageType": 4,"Image": "05_QQ","IsImageClickable": false,"UserName": "JOE","Avatar": "joe_os_01","Time": "AM 10:07"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "好啦 我要準備出門了 剩下到店裡再聊吧","Avatar": "cherry_os_01","Time": "AM 10:08"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "好喔 店裡等你","UserName": "JOE","Avatar": "joe_os_01","Time": "AM 10:08"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "別客人還沒到就先被我灌倒囉 酒神~","Avatar": "cherry_os_01","Time": "AM 10:08"},{"MessageType": 3,"Image": "04_XD","IsImageClickable": false,"UserName": "Cherry","Avatar": "cherry_os_01","Time": "AM 10:08"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "我現在收斂很多了啦","UserName": "JOE","Avatar": "joe_os_01","Time": "AM 10:08"}]

[{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "Hi Cafe今天几点开?","Avatar": "cherry_os_01","Time": "AM 09:58"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "八点 要来喝吗?","UserName": "JOE","Avatar": "joe_os_01","Time": "AM 10:01"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "我练团五点就结束了 晚上八点跟Simon有约
没地方去 想先去你那边等他","Avatar": "cherry_os_01","Time": "AM 10:01"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "喔喔 好阿! 那我五点先到店里 你就直接近来","UserName": "JOE","Avatar": "joe_os_01","Time": "AM 10:02"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "「进」啦","Avatar": "cherry_os_01","Time": "AM 10:02"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "别抓我错字 你是Simon吗 XDDD","UserName": "JOE","Avatar": "joe_os_01","Time": "AM 10:02"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "话说你们两个是不是复合了阿 怎么最近突然这么常联络?","UserName": "JOE","Avatar": "joe_os_01","Time": "AM 10:02"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "没有啦 有点复杂……","Avatar": "cherry_os_01","Time": "AM 10:05"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "我倒想问 Simon跟NEKO真的没有在交往吗?","Avatar": "cherry_os_01","Time": "AM 10:07"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "没有吧 他说年纪差很多 把对方当妹妹","UserName": "JOE","Avatar": "joe_os_01","Time": "AM 10:07"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "像Shannon一样吧...","Avatar": "cherry_os_01","Time": "AM 10:07"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "你有跟他聊过吗? 他妹现在的情况","Avatar": "cherry_os_01","Time": "AM 10:07"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "没欸 他完全不让我提他妹的事 每次一问就摆臭脸","UserName": "JOE","Avatar": "joe_os_01","Time": "AM 10:07"},{"MessageType": 4,"Image": "05_QQ","IsImageClickable": false,"UserName": "JOE","Avatar": "joe_os_01","Time": "AM 10:07"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "好啦 我要准备出门了 剩下到店里再聊吧","Avatar": "cherry_os_01","Time": "AM 10:08"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "好喔 店里等你","UserName": "JOE","Avatar": "joe_os_01","Time": "AM 10:08"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "别客人还没到就先被我灌倒啰 酒神~","Avatar": "cherry_os_01","Time": "AM 10:08"},{"MessageType": 3,"Image": "04_XD","IsImageClickable": false,"UserName": "Cherry","Avatar": "cherry_os_01","Time": "AM 10:08"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "我现在收敛很多了啦","UserName": "JOE","Avatar": "joe_os_01","Time": "AM 10:08"}]
